query.statement:
--20190410 제니퍼 SQL 부하로 인한 수정 LCH SELECT '0' AS CHECK , MAX(MM013A.EINDT) AS EINDT , MAX(MM013A.EBELN) AS EBELN , MAX(MM013A.EBELP) AS EBELP , MM013A.EXTWG AS MATNR , MAX(MM013A.TXZ01) AS TXZ01 , 1 AS MENGE , CASE WHEN SUM(MM013A.MFAIL) = 0 AND SUM(MM013A.MPASS) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MPASS , CASE WHEN SUM(MM013A.MFAIL) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS MFAIL , CASE WHEN SUM(MM013A.NCRED) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NCRED , CASE WHEN SUM(MM013A.NSEND) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS NSEND , CASE WHEN SUM(MM013A.SEND) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SEND , MAX(MM013A.POSID) AS POSID , MAX(MM013A.POST1) AS POST1 , MIN(MM013A.UDATE) AS UDATE , MIN(MM013A.SDATE) AS SDATE , MIN(MM013A.SHIPDAT) AS SHIPDAT , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_PROJ_END(MAX(MM013A.MANDT),MAX(MM013A.POSID) ),'') AS P_END , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_SEOLCHI_VEND_NAME(MAX(MM013A.MANDT),MAX(MM013A.POSID)),'') AS S_VEND , MAX(BIGO) AS BIGO , SAPHEE.GET_DAYS(MIN(MM013A.SDATE), SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8)) AS PERIOD , MIN(CAST(MA01.ZQNTY AS INT)) AS ZQNTY , MAX(MM013A.RDATE_P) AS RDATE_P , MAX(MM013A.BUDAT) AS BUDAT , MAX(MM013A.RECE_DATE) AS RECE_DATE , MAX(MA02.ZSPEC2) AS SPEC2 , MAX(MM013A.DZEINR) AS DZEINR FROM (
SELECT SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT ,MM013.EBELN AS EBELN ,MM013.EBELP AS EBELP ,MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG ,MM013.EXTWG AS MATNR ,MM013.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,MM013.MANDT AS MANDT ,COALESCE(MM013.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE ,COALESCE(MM017A.MPASS, 0) AS MPASS ,COALESCE(MM017A.MFAIL, 0) AS MFAIL ,COALESCE((MM013.MENGE - COALESCE((MM017A.MPASS+MM017A.NSEND+MM017A.SEND), 0)), 0) AS NCRED ,COALESCE(MM017A.NSEND, 0) AS NSEND ,COALESCE(MM017A.SEND, 0) AS SEND ,MM013.POSID AS POSID ,MM013.POST1 AS POST1 ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.RDATE_P) AS RDATE_P
-- NB,NS 의 경우 PRPS에서 출하일 가져옴 2014.05.16 HSS , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,7,2) IN ('NB','NS','NC') THEN (CASE WHEN MM013.EXTWG IS NULL OR MM013.EXTWG = '' OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '' AND MM013.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '24' AND MM013.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN PP027.ILDAT IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN PP027.ILDAT ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN '2' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN '3' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN '4' THEN PP027.ILDAT WHEN '5' THEN PP027.ILDAT ELSE '00000000' END) END ) ELSE ( CASE WHEN MM013.EXTWG IS NULL OR MM013.EXTWG = '' OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '' AND MM013.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '24' AND MM013.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN '2' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN '3' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN '4' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN '5' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) END ) END AS SHIPDAT
, CASE WHEN MM013.WERKS <> '2000' THEN SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_POOMOK(MM013.MANDT, MM013.POSID,MM013.MATNR) ELSE 'N' END AS BIGO -- , 'N' AS BIGO ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017A.BUDAT) AS BUDAT ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM017A.RECE_DATE) AS RECE_DATE ,MM011.DZEINR AS DZEINR FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT MANDT AS MANDT ,EBELN AS EBELN ,EBELP AS EBELP ,SUM(NSEND) AS NSEND ,SUM(SEND) AS SEND ,SUM(MPASS) AS MPASS ,SUM(MFAIL) AS MFAIL ,MAX(BUDAT) AS BUDAT ,MAX(RECE_DATE) AS RECE_DATE FROM ( SELECT MM017.MANDT AS MANDT ,MM017.EBELN AS EBELN ,MM017.EBELP AS EBELP ,CASE WHEN PRO_F = '1' THEN COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE),0) ELSE 0 END AS NSEND ,CASE WHEN PRO_F = '2' THEN COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE),0) ELSE 0 END AS SEND ,CASE WHEN PRO_F = '4' THEN COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE),0) ELSE 0 END AS MPASS ,CASE WHEN PRO_F = '4' THEN COALESCE(SUM(MM017.B_MENGE),0) ELSE 0 END AS MFAIL ,MAX(MM017.BUDAT) AS BUDAT ,MAX(MM017.RECE_DATE) AS RECE_DATE FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS MM017 WHERE MM017.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND MM017.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM017.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#UDATE2#,'YYYYMMDD'),1),'YYYYMMDD')
AND MM017.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM017.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM017.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM017.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM017.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM017.MATNR LIKE '%'||#MATNR#||'%'
AND MM017.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM017.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
AND MM017.POTYPE = 'X' AND MM017.PRO_F >= '1' GROUP BY MM017.MANDT,MM017.EBELN,MM017.EBELP,MM017.PRO_F) AS S WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY S.MANDT,S.EBELN,S.EBELP
) AS MM017A ON MM013.MANDT = MM017A.MANDT AND MM013.EBELN = MM017A.EBELN AND MM013.EBELP = MM017A.EBELP INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR
-- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT026 AS MM026 ON MM011.MANDT = MM026.MANDT -- AND MM011.EXTWG = MM026.BOXNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM013.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02'
-- NB,NS 의 경우 PRPS에서 출하일 가져옴 2014.05.16 HSS -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.PRPS AS PR ON PR.MANDT= MM013.MANDT -- AND PR.POSID = MM013.POSID -- NB,NS,NC 출하일 ZPPT027 에서 가져옴 2015.12.09 조영욱 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT027 AS PP027 ON MM013.MANDT = PP027.MANDT AND MM013.POSID = PP027.POSID AND PP027.ACTIV = '05' AND PP027.BLOCK = 'A' AND PP027.GUBUN = '01'
WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND MM013.STATE = '2'
AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#UDATE2#,'YYYYMMDD'),1),'YYYYMMDD')
AND MM013.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM013.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM013.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM013.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM013.MATNR LIKE '%'||#MATNR#||'%'
AND MM013.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM013.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
AND MM013.POTYPE = 'X' ) AS MM013A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA01 ON MA01.MANDT= MM013A.MANDT AND MA01.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,2) = 'QM' THEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,8) WHEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,1) = 'Q' THEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,7) ELSE SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,6) END) LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MA02 ON MA02.MANDT = MM013A.MANDT AND MA02.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,7,1) = 'N' THEN MM013A.POSID ELSE SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,6) END) AND MA02.POSID_1 = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,7,1) = 'N' THEN MM013A.POSID ELSE SUBSTR(MM013A.POSID,1,9) END) WHERE 1=1
AND MM013A.SHIPDAT BETWEEN #UDATE1# AND #UDATE2#
AND MM013A.MENGE = (MM013A.MPASS+MM013A.MFAIL)
AND MM013A.MENGE > (MM013A.MPASS+MM013A.MFAIL)
AND LENGTH(MM013A.POSID) > 5 AND MM013A.POSID LIKE '%'||#KIND# || '%'
AND (MM013A.POSID LIKE '%NB%' OR MM013A.POSID LIKE '%NS%' OR MM013A.POSID LIKE '%NC%')
GROUP BY MM013A.MANDT, MM013A.POSID, MM013A.EXTWG ORDER BY UDATE,POSID,MATNR FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
